msg.msgText: A call to send() or publish() on a MessageProducer object failed because the destination is not set. The destination must be set.

msgExplanation.p: The destination must be set on the MessageProducer, TopicPublisher or QueueSender object or it must be specified in the call to send() or publish().

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the destination is set in the producer or in the call to send() or publish().
